Class ASimulationControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ethz.inspire.emod.simulation.ASimulationControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeometricKienzleSimulationControl, ProcessSimulationControl, RandomSimulationControl, StaticSimulationControl

    public abstract class ASimulationControl
extends java.lang.Object
    generic simulation control object.

    dhampl

      protected void readConfig()
      reads the machine states and maps them to simulation states
      abstract void setSimulationPeriod(double periodLength)
      sets the simulation period length in seconds. if required, samples are re- sampled to the given rate.
      void setState(MachineState state)
      sets the state. the state is mapped through the stateMap to valid states for the simulator.
      abstract void update()
      updates the simulationOutput IOContainer according to the SimulationState and simulation logic for the next simulation cycle.

      • readConfig

        protected void readConfig()
        reads the machine states and maps them to simulation states
        Parameters:
        file - each MachineState is represented by one line MachineState_state=SimState ; e.g. READY_state=ON
